message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
Take it or leave it, I'm not budging!
I'm willing to give you a better deal, but you need to meet me halfway!
You're getting desperate, I'm not giving in yet!
I'm still willing to compromise, but you need to meet me more than halfway now!
You're getting close to desperation, I'm not backing down!
I'm getting closer to my final offer, meet me in the middle or walk away!
You're getting close to my final offer, meet me at 50/50 or we'll both walk away empty-handed!
